pages.text: The sack that you got as a goodie bag is actually kind of neat. You can place it down on the ground or hang it from a branch or ceiling when you need to rummage through your belongings. It isn't very roomy with only five slots. Also it's rather cumbersome.
If you happen upon some wheat and a piece of string you can make more sacks. Just note that carrying more than two will quickly be quite awkward.
